title: DDFP 373: NFC East preview
itunes:title: DDFP 373: NFC East preview
description:
Shek is joined by former NFL scout Bucky Brooks to break down how the Patriots will fare in their first four games following the league’s decision to uphold Tom Brady’s suspension. The guys also analyze what each NFC East team must do to win the division crown. Finally, Shek previews the Steelers season with Pittsburgh Tribune-Review writer Mark Kaboly.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
